snippet: SLATER--Selma Terner. We mourn the passing of our beloved aunt Selma who will live on in the hearts and minds of all who loved her. To cousins Michael and Rick Weber we offer our heartfelt sympathy. May her memory be a source of blessing, inspirat...
lead_paragraph: SLATER--Selma Terner. We mourn the passing of our beloved aunt Selma who will live on in the hearts and minds of all who loved her. To cousins Michael and Rick Weber we offer our heartfelt sympathy. May her memory be a source of blessing, inspiration, and her soul be bound up in the bond of life. Our love forever, Vivian Mook Baer and Stephen Baer, RoseMarie Mook, Alex Maia, Shannon Mook, Nick, Stacy and Danielle Mook 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SLATER, SELMA TERNER
